scripts.compile: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=develop cross-env TASK=compile node ./tools/server/index
scripts.deploy-dev: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=develop cross-env TASK=migrate node ./tools/server/index
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=rinkeby cross-env TASK=deploy node ./tools/server/index
scripts.deploy-rinkeby:infura: npx cross-env NETWORK=rinkebyInfura truffle migrate --reset --compile-all --network rinkebyInfura
scripts.deploy-mainnet: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=mainnet cross-env TASK=deploy node ./tools/server/index
scripts.test: yarn lint && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=develop cross-env TASK=test node ./tools/server/index
scripts.coverage: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=develop cross-env TASK=coverage node ./tools/server/index
scripts.testrpc: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=develop cross-env TASK=testrpc node ./tools/server/index
scripts.clean: npx shx rm -fr docs db dist build bin coverage
scripts.reset: npx yarn run clean && npx shx rm -fr node_modules
